Obstacles.Name: Anti-Life Aura
Obstacles.Description: While in the aura, living creatures can't heal or rest

Obstacles.Name: Battering Winds
Obstacles.Description: Reduce Speed by half. Ranged Attacks are at disadvantage

Obstacles.Name: Blade Barrier
Obstacles.Description: Wall of whirling blades covers one Entrance

Obstacles.Name: Cave-In
Obstacles.Description: This room can only be traversed once the blockage has been cleared. Even then, it may be unstable.

Obstacles.Name: Chasm
Obstacles.Description: A 20' wide Chasm rips across the center of this room.

Obstacles.Name: Flooding
Obstacles.Description: This room is lower than the surrounding area, and filled with 20' of water.

Obstacles.Name: Lava
Obstacles.Description: Lava rises into the center of this room.

Obstacles.Name: Poison Gas
Obstacles.Description: Seeps in from cracks in tha wallls and fills room.
